entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
